entities.name: frank
entities.description: The narrator of the story who is listening to a conversation between two men.

entities.name: wormtail
entities.description: One of the men in the conversation with Lord Voldemort, who is hesitant to follow through with the plan.

entities.name: lord voldemort
entities.description: The leader of the group and the one giving orders to Wormtail.

relationships.description: Wormtail is under Lord Voldemort's control, as he is being ordered around by him.
There is no direct relationship between Wormtail and Frank, but they are both present in the conversation.
